plot: Life gives freedom with seclusion while moral dilemmas prevail. Mickey must decide whether to accept a life road free of worry with all the cash he will need, or help an abused young neighbor from her victimization.
title: Sad Eyes
plot_es: Life gives freedom with seclusion while moral dilemmas prevail. Mickey must decide whether to accept a life road free of worry with all the cash he will need, or help an abused young neighbor from her victimization.
plot_en: Life gives freedom with seclusion while moral dilemmas prevail. Mickey must decide whether to accept a life road free of worry with all the cash he will need, or help an abused young neighbor from her victimization.
